possible_violations.violation_name: Alleged violations of Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: MSF reports violence at the Hungarian-Serbian border. The Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) published on their Twitter account photos and testimonies of migrants who allegedly had been violently pushed back off the HUN-SRB border by Hungarian border officials. The Frontex Fundamental Rights Officer is proposed to act as the coordinator.
records.evidence_quote: The Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) published on their Twitter account photos and testimonies of migrants who allegedly had been violently pushed back off the HUN-SRB border by Hungarian border officials.
